moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Let’s Brainstorm!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Atk and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.effect: Never misses during a hailstorm. Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Natural Remedy
passives.description: Once per battle, removes all status conditions from the user when the user is inflicted by any status condition.

passives.name: Quick Cure
passives.description: Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user once during battle.
